text.en: The income of x is 45% less than sum of income of y and income of z is 42% more that of y and income of z is 45% less than sum of income of x & y, by what % is income of z less than x? (approx).

trick_application: Income of z = 142 (42% more than y)
Sum of income of x and y = 242
Income of x = 242 x 55% = 133.1 (45% less than sum of x and y)
Income of z is 133.1 - 142 = -8.9 less than x
